text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Tch. Patético. Esa fue una carrera tan<n>torpe...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Damn, I'm so weak! Weak! I shouldn't be<n>worn out
already.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Corre más fuerte... más fuerte. ¡Tengo que correr<n>más fuerte!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unable to get results due to fatigue,<n>Narita Brian
has become more impatient<n>and irritated than
usual... This isn't good.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We shouldn't push it any harder. I should<n>
probably rethink her race schedule...
